Class Gluons

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Controller
      controllers.Gluons
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport
public class Gluons
extends play.mvc.Controller

Gluon CRUD admin tool. Allows to manage the official gluon list for Qantiqa overlay.

Author:
Dario

create

public static void create(java.lang.String host,
                          java.lang.Integer port,
                          java.lang.String secret)
POST method to create gluons from {blank().

Parameters:
host - Gluon's WAN IP.
port - Gluon's published port.
secret - Gluon's secret (using the generated one by Play with "play secret" and stored in qa-node-api/conf/application.conf.
